name: mise-en-place-react
description: A re-implentation of the mise en place project using react

scripts.start-dev: concurrently "cd src/server && npm run watch" "cd src/client && npm start"
scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && cd src && cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.install: cd src/server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i

author: Jonathan Bridge, Mia Carmen, Devin Nguyen
